question: What is the quantum of the annual dividend pay-out approved by the Reserve Bank of India, to the Government?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has approved an annual dividend pay-out of more than Rs 57,000 crore to the Indian Government.
In this yearâ€™s budget, the Government had estimated a dividend of Rs 60,000 crore from the central bank and other government owned financial institutions. The Government's fiscal deficit stood at a record high Rs 6.62 lakh crore in the April-June period.
